categories: Category:Battles of the Disciples of Ragnos campaign

nodes.text: The Mission to Wayland was carried out by Corran Horn during the Disciples of Ragnos crisis in 14 ABY.

Luke Skywalker sent several Jedi to places where he felt a strong connection to the Force, after Alora sliced into his records. The objective of the mission was to investigate cult or Imperial Remnant presence on the planet Wayland.
